DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare fusion rate EBI , LLC C-Tek™ Anterior Cervical Plate , Slotted Hole Design versus Fixed Hole Design .
DOC.brief_title: Slotted Hole Versus Fixed Hole C-Tek
DOC.detailed_description: This study 's purpose compare fusion rate EBI , LLC C-Tek™ Anterior Cervical Plate , Slotted Hole Design versus Fixed Hole Design
DOC.criteria: 1 . Radiographic evidence compress cervical root cord either ossify bony element herniated nucleus pulposus . 2 . Symptomatic radiculopathy appropriate compress nerve root . 3 . Cervical spondylosis evidence reactive change vertebral body interspace , may associate chronic discopathy . 4 . Primary anterior cervical spinal fusion ( ACDF ) perform use anterior cervical plate either discectomy ( SmithRobinson technique ) Corpectomy . 5 . Adult male female , 18 75 year age . 6 . The subject his/her legal guardian willing consent participate study . 7 . The subject available followup minimum 24 month . 1 . Traumatic cervical injury . 2 . Posterior augmentation revision fusion . 3 . Cervical fusion involve C1 C2 vertebra . 4 . Cervical fusion involve three level . 5 . Previous spine surgery level fix CTek plate . 6 . Systemic condition : Spondylitis , Paget 's disease , Rheumatoid arthritis , Infection within two week surgery , Cancer , Renal disease insufficiency creatinine level 2 , Chronic use steroid condition may affect bone metabolism 7 .
